title: Science Learning Design Based on Virtual World Games

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Scientific Theories and VR Device Operation Experience
context.additional_context: Interactive learning in a virtual world that mimics real scientific laboratory environments.

learning_goals: Achieve 80% or higher accuracy in molecular structure assembly tasks within a virtual world simulation.
Improve scientific thinking skills by two or more levels during game-mechanism-based problem-solving processes.
Share experimental designs with peer learners three or more times through VR collaboration projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
